title: The Best 5 AI Contract Review Tools in 2025
summary: Unlock the power of AI Contract Review tools to streamline your legal processes and enhance accuracy. These innovative solutions automate the analysis of contracts, identifying key clauses, potential risks, and compliance issues, saving you time and reducing human error. Perfect for legal professionals and businesses alike, AI Contract Review tools empower you to make informed decisions quickly and efficiently. Explore our curated selection of top-tier tools to elevate your contract management todayâ€”your smarter, more efficient workflow awaits!

tools.name: Humata
tools.description: Humata is an AI-powered platform that enables users to analyze, summarize, and extract insights from documents like PDFs, Word files, and PowerPoint presentations.

tools.name: Harvey
tools.description: Harvey provides AI-powered solutions to streamline legal workflows for law firms and corporate legal teams.

tools.name: Spellbook
tools.description: Spellbook is an AI-powered platform designed to assist legal professionals in drafting, reviewing, and negotiating contracts efficiently.

tools.name: Intapp
tools.description: Intapp provides cloud-based software solutions tailored for professional services firms to enhance risk management, compliance, and operational efficiency.

tools.name: Genie3
tools.description: Genie3.ai is an AI-powered platform that assists users in drafting, reviewing, and managing legal documents efficiently.
